remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別的代表單一作業，這通常是傳回值，並以非同步方式執行。The class represents a single operation that returns a value and that usually executes asynchronously. 物件是其中一個的中央元件[工作式非同步模式](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/task-based-asynchronous-pattern-tap.md)首度引進.NET Framework 4 中。 objects are one of the central components of the [task-based asynchronous pattern](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/task-based-asynchronous-pattern-tap.md) first introduced in the .NET Framework 4. 因為所執行的工作物件通常是以非同步方式執行的執行緒集區執行緒上而不是以同步方式在主應用程式執行緒中，您可以使用屬性，以及， ，及屬性，以判斷工作的狀態。Because the work performed by a object typically executes asynchronously on a thread pool thread rather than synchronously on the main application thread, you can use the property, as well as the , , and properties, to determine the state of a task. 大多數情況下，lambda 運算式用來指定工作可執行的工作。Most commonly, a lambda expression is used to specify the work that the task is to perform. 執行個體可能會建立各種不同的方式。 instances may be created in a variety of ways. 最常見的方法，起[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，方法是呼叫靜態或方法。The most common approach, which is available starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], is to call the static or method. 這些方法會提供簡單的方式來啟動工作，使用預設值並不需要額外的參數。These methods provide a simple way to start a task by using default values and without acquiring additional parameters. 下列範例會使用方法來啟動工作並執行迴圈，然後顯示迴圈反覆項目數目：The following example uses the method to start a task that loops and then displays the number of loop iterations: [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.Task\`1#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task`1/cs/run1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.Task\`1#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task`1/vb/run1.vb#6)] 或者，並啟動工作的最常見方式[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]，方法是呼叫靜態或方法。An alternative, and the most common way to start a task in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], is to call the static or method. 屬性會傳回物件，而屬性會傳回物件。The property returns a object, and the property returns a object. 多載其`StartNew`方法可讓您傳遞引數，定義工作建立選項，並指定工作排程器。Overloads of their `StartNew` method let you pass arguments, define task creation options, and specify a task scheduler. 下列範例會使用啟動工作的方法。The following example uses the method to start a task. 它相當於前一個範例中的程式碼。It is functionally equivalent to the code in the previous example. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.Task\`1#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task`1/cs/startnew1.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.Task\`1#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task`1/vb/startnew1.vb#7)] 如需更完整的範例，請參閱 < [ 工作式非同步程式設計](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/task-based-asynchronous-programming.md)。For more complete examples, see [Task-based Asynchronous Programming](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/task-based-asynchronous-programming.md). 類別也會提供建構函式所初始化的工作，但是，不要排程它執行。The class also provides constructors that initialize the task but that do not schedule it for execution. 基於效能考量和`Task.Factory.StartNew`方法都是慣用的機制，來建立和排程計算工作，但其中必須以工作建立和排程的情況下，可能會使用建構函式，而工作的方法可能會接著用來排程在稍後執行的工作。For performance reasons, the and `Task.Factory.StartNew` methods are the preferred mechanisms for creating and scheduling computational tasks, but for scenarios where task creation and scheduling must be separated, the constructors may be used, and the task's method may then be used to schedule the task for execution at a later time. 從桌面應用程式為目標[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]，建立並叫用工作之執行緒的文化特性會變成的執行緒內容的一部分。Starting with desktop apps that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)], the culture of the thread that creates and invokes a task becomes part of the thread's context. 也就是工作的目前執行緒文化特性執行該工作，不論目前的文化特性是工作的呼叫執行緒的文化特性。That is, regardless of the current culture of the thread on which the task executes, the current culture of the task is the culture of the calling thread. 之前的.NET Framework 版本為目標的應用程式的[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]，工作的文化特性是執行該工作之執行緒的文化特性。For apps that target versions of the .NET Framework prior to the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)], the culture of the task is the culture of the thread on which the task executes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 「 文化特性和以工作為基礎的非同步作業 > 一節中主題。For more information, see the "Culture and task-based asynchronous operations" section in the topic. 請注意，市集應用程式會遵循 Windows 執行階段設定和取得預設文化特性。Note that Store apps follow the Windows Runtime in setting and getting the default culture. 對於不傳回值的作業，您使用類別。For operations that do not return a value, you use the class. 開頭為C#7.0，更精簡的工作，實值型別，而不是參考類型，使用結構。Starting with C# 7.0, for a more lightweight task that is a value type rather than a reference type, use the structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式應該只用在進階案例中需要建立和啟動工作分隔。This constructor should only be used in advanced scenarios where it is required that the creation and starting of the task is separated. 而不是呼叫此建構函式，最常見的方式來具現化物件和啟動工作是藉由呼叫靜態和方法。Rather than calling this constructor, the most common way to instantiate a object and launch a task is by calling the static and methods. 如果任何動作的工作僅供取用者的 API 需要有東西可以等候，應該使用。If a task with no action is needed just for the consumer of an API to have something to await, a should be used. ## Examples 下列範例會計算文字在代表已發行活頁簿的文字檔案中的近似數目。The following example counts the approximate number of words in text files that represent published books. 每個工作負責開啟檔案，以非同步的方式，讀取其完整內容，而且使用規則運算式來計算字數統計。Each task is responsible for opening a file, reading its entire contents asynchronously, and calculating the word count by using a regular expression. 會呼叫方法，以確保所有工作已都完成之前向主控台顯示每本書的字數。The method is called to ensure that all tasks have completed before displaying the word count of each book to the console. 物件具現化會分開物件執行，在此範例中，讓此範例可確保每個檔案存在。Object instantiation is separated from object execution in this example so that the example can ensure that each file exists. 如果沒有的話，它會顯示遺漏的檔案名稱。If they do not, it displays the name of the missing file. 否則，它會呼叫方法來啟動每項工作。Otherwise, it calls the method to launch each task. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.Task.ctor#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task.ctor/cs/run3.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.Task.ctor#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task.ctor/vb/run3.vb#2)] 規則運算式模式`\p{P}*\s+`比對零個、 一個或多個標點符號字元，後面接著一或多個空格字元。The regular expression pattern `\p{P}*\s+` matches zero, one, or more punctuation characters followed by one or more white-space characters. 它會假設的相符項目總數等於大約字數。It assumes that the total number of matches equals the approximate word count.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回將不會排定執行目前的工作完成之前，是否因為成功執行到完成、 失敗，因為發生未處理的例外狀況，或提早結束，因取消才完成。The returned will not be scheduled for execution until the current task has completed, whether it completes due to running to completion successfully, faulting due to an unhandled exception, or exiting early due to being canceled. ## Examples 下列範例會建立使用 Sieve Eratosthenes 計算介於 1 和使用者所輸入的值之間的質數的前項工作。The following example creates an antecedent task that uses the Sieve of Eratosthenes to calculate the prime numbers between 1 and a value entered by the user. 陣列用來保存質數的相關資訊。An array is used to hold information about the prime numbers. 陣列索引代表數字，以及元素的值會指出該數字是否複合 (其值是`true`) 或質數 (其值是`false`)。The array index represents the number, and the element's value indicates whether that number is composite (its value is `true`) or prime (its value is `false`). 這項工作接著會傳遞給接續工作，也就是負責質數擷取整數陣列，並將它們顯示。This task is then passed to a continuation task, which is responsible for extracting the prime numbers from the integer array and displaying them. remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回將不會排定執行目前的工作完成之前，是否因為成功執行到完成、 失敗，因為發生未處理的例外狀況，或提早結束出因取消才完成。The returned will not be scheduled for execution until the current task has completed, whether it completes due to running to completion successfully, faulting due to an unhandled exception, or exiting out early due to being canceled. ## Examples 下列範例將建立的工作，會傳遞介於 2 到 20 之間的整數，並傳回陣列，包含前十個指數 (從 n1 n10) 該數字。The following example creates a task that is passed an integer between 2 and 20 and returns an array that contains the first ten exponents (from n1 to n10) of that number. 接續工作是則負責顯示指數。A continuation task is then responsible for displaying the exponents. 它會傳遞前項和原始的數字前項所產生的指數。It is passed both the antecedent and the original number whose exponents the antecedent generates. remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回將不會排定執行目前的工作完成之前，是否因為成功執行到完成、 失敗，因為發生未處理的例外狀況，或提早結束出因取消才完成。The returned will not be scheduled for execution until the current task has completed, whether it completes due to running to completion successfully, faulting due to an unhandled exception, or exiting out early due to being canceled. ## Examples 下列範例會建立使用 Sieve Eratosthenes 計算介於 1 和使用者所輸入的值之間的質數的前項工作。The following example creates an antecedent task that uses the Sieve of Eratosthenes to calculate the prime numbers between 1 and a value entered by the user. 陣列用來保存質數的相關資訊。An array is used to hold information about the prime numbers. 陣列索引代表數字，以及元素的值會指出該數字是否複合 (其值是`true`) 或質數 (其值是`false`)。The array index represents the number, and the element's value indicates whether that number is composite (its value is `true`) or prime (its value is `false`). 這項工作接著會傳遞給接續工作，也就是負責質數擷取整數陣列，並將它們顯示。This task is then passed to a continuation task, which is responsible for extracting the prime numbers from the integer array and displaying them. 取消語彙基元傳遞至前項和接續工作。A cancellation token is passed to both the antecedent and the continuation task. A物件用來定義 100 毫秒的逾時值。A object is used to define a timeout value of 100 milliseconds. 事件引發時，如果呼叫方法時，並取消語彙基元來要求取消的工作。If the event fires, the method is called, and the cancellation token is used to request cancellation of the tasks. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.Task\`1.ContinueWith#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task`1.continuewith/cs/continue1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.Task\`1.ContinueWith#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task`1.continuewith/vb/continue1.vb#1)] 一般而言，提供大約 100,000 的值會導致逾時間隔到期和引發的事件和設定取消要求。Typically, supplying a value of about 100,000 causes the timeout interval to expire and the event to fire, and the cancellation request to be set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回將不會排定執行直到完成目前的工作。The returned will not be scheduled for execution until the current task has completed. 如果透過指定的準則`continuationOptions`不符合參數，即會取消接續工作而不是排程。If the criteria specified through the `continuationOptions` parameter are not met, the continuation task will be canceled instead of scheduled. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[使用接續工作鏈結工作](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/chaining-tasks-by-using-continuation-tasks.md)。For more information, see [Chaining Tasks by Using Continuation Tasks](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/chaining-tasks-by-using-continuation-tasks.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回將不會排定執行目前的工作完成之前，是否因為成功執行到完成、 失敗，因為發生未處理的例外狀況，或提早結束出因取消才完成。The returned will not be scheduled for execution until the current task has completed, whether it completes due to running to completion successfully, faulting due to an unhandled exception, or exiting out early due to being canceled. ## Examples 下列範例會建立接續工作鏈結。The following example creates a chain of continuation tasks. 每個工作提供目前的時間，物件的狀態引數方法。Each task provides the current time, a object, for the state argument of the method. 每個值代表 「 繼續 」 工作建立時。Each value represents the time at which the continue task is created. 每個工作會產生做為其結果，第二個值，表示工作完成的時間。Each task produces as its result a second value that represents the time at which the task finishes. 所有工作都完成之後，這個範例會顯示日期和時間每個接續工作會啟動並完成。After all tasks finish, the example displays the date and times at which each continuation task starts and finishes. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會傳回預設執行個體等同於呼叫無參數所建立的類別建構函式。This property returns a default instance of the class that is identical to the one created by calling the parameterless constructor. 它有下列屬性值：It has the following property values: |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||| ||| ||| ||`null`或 `null`, or | 這個屬性的最常見的使用，就是建立並啟動新工作的單一呼叫中方法。The most common use of this property is to create and start a new task in a single call to the method. > [!NOTE] > 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，則方法會提供最簡單的方式建立物件使用預設組態值。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], the method provides the easiest way to create a object with default configuration values. 下列範例會使用靜態屬性，以便三次呼叫方法。The following example uses the static property to make three calls to the method. 第一次啟動`Task`物件，它會執行 lambda 運算式會傳回 1。The first starts a `Task` object, which executes a lambda expression that returns 1. 在第二個啟動`Task`物件，它會執行具現化新的 lambda 運算式`Test`執行個體。The second starts a `Task` object, which executes a lambda expression that instantiates a new `Test` instance. 在第三個啟動`Task`物件，其中會列舉 C:\Users\Public\Pictures\Sample Pictures\ 目錄中的檔案。The third starts a `Task` object, which enumerates the files in the C:\Users\Public\Pictures\Sample Pictures\ directory. （請注意，順利執行此範例需要目錄存在，而且它包含的檔案。(Note that successful execution of the example requires that the directory exist and that it contain files. [!code-csharp[TPL#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/tpl/cs/returnavalue10.cs#10)] [!code-vb[TPL#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/tpl/vb/10_returnavalue.vb#10)]

summary.span: 取得這個 的結果值。

span.span: Gets the result value of this .

value.span: 結果值，這個，做為工作的類型參數相同的類型。

span.span: The result value of this , which is of the same type as the task's type parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 存取屬性的 get 存取子封鎖呼叫執行緒，直到非同步作業已完成;它相當於呼叫方法。Accessing the property's get accessor blocks the calling thread until the asynchronous operation is complete; it is equivalent to calling the method. 可用作業的結果之後，它會儲存，並在後續呼叫會立即傳回屬性。Once the result of an operation is available, it is stored and is returned immediately on subsequent calls to the property. 請注意，如果工作的作業期間發生的例外狀況，或如果工作已取消，屬性不會傳回值。Note that, if an exception occurred during the operation of the task, or if the task has been cancelled, the property does not return a value. 相反地，嘗試存取屬性值都會擲回例外狀況。Instead, attempting to access the property value throws an exception. ## Examples 下列範例會計算其名稱做為命令列引數傳遞每個目錄中的檔案中的位元組數的命令列公用程式。The following example is a command-line utility that calculates the number of bytes in the files in each directory whose name is passed as a command-line argument. 如果目錄包含檔案，就會執行具現化的 lambda 運算式目錄中的每個檔案的物件，擷取的值和其屬性。If the directory contains files, it executes a lambda expression that instantiates a object for each file in the directory and retrieves the value of its property. 如果目錄不包含任何檔案，則只會呼叫方法用來建立工作的屬性為零 (0)。If a directory contains no files, it simply calls the method to create a task whose property is zero (0). 當工作完成時，所有的目錄檔案中的位元組總數是可從屬性。When the tasks finish, the total number of bytes in all a directory's files is available from the property. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.Task.FromResult#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task.fromresult/cs/fromresult1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.Task.FromResult#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task.fromresult/vb/fromresult1.vb#1)]
